titleInfo.title: International stability and progress: United States interests and instruments.

originInfo.publisher: New York, American Assembly, Graduate School of Business, Columbia University, 1957.

mods.note: Introduction: Foreign assistance in perspective, by L. Gordon.--Ends and means of American foreign policy, by P.C. Jessup.--Soviet economy and Soviet world power, by G. Grossman.--Competitive coexistence and economic development in Asia, by E.S. Mason.--The policy background for military assistance, by P.H. Nitze.--American aid and economic development: some critical issues, by T.C. Schelling.--Final report of the Eleventh American Assembly.--Participants in the Eleventh American Assembly.--National Policy Board of the American Assembly.
